name: Winter Train
description: Connect additional cars to the back of Winter Train buildings to provide them with extra production bonuses.

name: Hippodrome
description: Add additional tracks between the two Hippodrome main buildings to provide them with extra production bonuses.

name: Terracotta Vineyard
description: Connect additional Vineyard Fields to the Terracotta Vineyard to increase its overall production.

name: Road to Victory
description: Connect additional Roads to Victory to the Statue of Honor to increase its overall production.

name: Pirate's Hideout
description: Connect additional Pirate Reefs to the Pirate's Hideout to increase its overall production.

name: Mughal Empire Chain
description: Connect additional basic Diplomacy buildings to the sides of the Embassy to increase their overall diplomacy.

name: The Great Elephant
description: Connect additional Iridescent Gardens to the Building to increase its overall production.

name: Windmill Farm
description: Connect additional Farm Paths Fields to the Gentiana Windmill to increase its overall production.
